# B  {#sec-B.unnumbered}

In this part of the book we will look at the geoms starts with letter "b" or "B".

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(kableExtra)
geomb <- c('geom_bar',
          'geom_bin_2d',
          'geom_bin2d_pattern',
          'geom_bin2d',
          'geom_blank',
          'geom_boxplot')
sectionb <- c(4.1, 4.2, 4.3, 4.4, 4.5, 4.6)
dfb <- data.frame(geom = geomb,
                  section = sectionb)
dfb |> knitr::kable() 
```
